passage.title: A factory
passage.paragraph: Lin Ying's brother is a young worker. He works in a factory in Shanghai.
The factory is very big. There are all kinds of cars in the factory. The windows in the workshops are bright. It's not very hot in the summer, and there is always fresh air. But it is noisy there.
There are a few flags on the walls. The factory is a model factory. Her brother works very hard.
